properties.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern El Paso/Western Hudspeth Counties; Eastern/Central El Paso County; Salt Basin; Otero Mesa; Northern Hudspeth Highlands/Hueco Mountains; Southern Tularosa Basin; Western El Paso County
properties.senderName: NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 2 at 1:17PM MST until February 3 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso TX/Santa Teresa NM
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of far west Texas and the Otero Mesa of south
central New Mexico.

* WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The peak winds will occur in the late
afternoon before decreasing after sunset. Some patchy blowing
dust is also possible reducing visibilities to 3 to 5 miles.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST MONDAY
